intro: Elatostema huanglianshanicum, commonly known as the Huanglianshan stonecrop, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae and is characterized by its small, succulent leaves and delicate white flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or shaded environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. It is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological significance in its native habitat. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
